title: Update fail
body: im trying to update League of Legends however its stop at 33%.

replies.body: Same problem. Multiple threads on this.  Update sticks at 33% and then throws up an error message indicating to check the logs.
Indeed, there were multiple threads on this during a period of patching issues for some players.  Everything should be okay now!  Let me know if you still have issues updating!
I am still having the issue and I noticed it keeps stops at 370 everytime
